name: accounts/1001/locations/2001/reviews/3001
comment: Absolutely brilliant! Felt like a new person after my session. Andrew really knows his stuff. Will be back for sure. This is a slightly longer review to test the 'Read more' functionality to see how it behaves when the text exceeds the predefined maximum length.

name: accounts/1001/locations/2001/reviews/3002
comment: Great massage, very professional. Feeling much better.

name: accounts/1001/locations/2001/reviews/3003
comment: Best sports massage I've had. Andrew is excellent and very attentive to problem areas. Highly recommended!

name: accounts/1001/locations/2001/reviews/3004
comment: Very good service. Helped with my tight hamstrings. The online booking was easy too.

name: accounts/1001/locations/2001/reviews/3005
comment: Top class treatment. Andrew is a true professional and I always leave feeling significantly better. If you're looking for a sports massage, this is the place.
